U.S. DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE
NATIONAL AGRICULTURAL STATISTICS SERVICE

NASS
1997 SUMMARY



STATE	AREA HARV	 HAY DRY	 ALFALFA HAY DRY	 OTHER HAY DRY	 TOTAL HAY DRY	 WHEAT AREA	 OATS AREA	 BARLEY AREA	 RYE AREA	 SORGHUM FOR GRAIN AREA	 CORN GRND AREA	 SOYBEAN AREA	 PEANUT AREA	 FLAX AREA	 MISC. CROP AREA
